Comments.Message:
Did this happen once or is it consistently happening on your setup?

Thanks,

I actually figured out the problem but forgot to come back here and post.  The problem was I installed Office 2010 and it changed something with my .Net Framework 4 install.  Once I reinstalled Fishbowl 2 ( and VS2010 and SQL Server 2008 etc....) everything is back to working.

My advice, don't install Office 2010 on your development system or anything else using Net Framework 4.  ;)
